text: Guizbangɨra, dughiar kɨ gavgaviba puvatɨzim, dughiar kamra kɨ gavgavir bar ekiam iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kraisɨn ziam bangɨn kɨ gavgaviba puvatɨ, ezɨ gumaziba pazavɨra na gami, ezɨ osɨmtɨzir avɨriba na batifi, ezɨ gumaziba arazir kurabar na gami, ezɨ gumaziba bar na gasɨghasɨghasava ami. Ezɨ kɨ arazir kabagh nɨghnɨgha nan navir averiam bar deravɨra uabɨn asugha iti.
